TextLibrary.Text: Princess Serephine
Hello, Princess. I guess your father told you that I'll be escorting you to Trarg...
Hello, Princess. I guess your father told you that I'll be escorting you to Trarg...
Hello, Princess. I guess your father told you that I'll be escorting you to Trarg...
Hello, Princess. I guess your father told you that I'll be escorting you to Trarg...
My father tells me nothing. Obviously he doesn't trust me. But... he sent an Agarian! I'm impressed!
My father tells me nothing. Obviously he doesn't trust me. But... he sent an Agarian! I'm impressed!
My father tells me nothing. Obviously he doesn't trust me. But... he sent an Agarian! I'm impressed!
My father tells me nothing. Obviously he doesn't trust me. But... he sent an Agarian! I'm impressed!
Impressed?
Impressed?
Impressed?
Impressed?
Who wouldn't be? Agarians are well known for their chivalry and honor. Of course, no one ever warned me of how... attractive... Agarian men are.
Who wouldn't be? Agarians are well known for their chivalry and honor. Of course, no one ever warned me of how... attractive... Agarian men are.
Who wouldn't be? Agarians are well known for their chivalry and honor. But there is one obvious flaw in his plan...
Who wouldn't be? Agarians are well known for their chivalry and honor. But there is one obvious flaw in his plan...
Your father warned me that you'd try this...
Your father warned me that you'd try this...
And what is that, Princess?
And what is that, Princess?
Try what? Is it so bad that I find you attractive?
Try what? Is it so bad that I find you attractive?

One can tell simply by looking at you, that not only are you keenly intelligent, but also an extremely compassionate individual. Such a shining paragon of virtue would never send me to such a cruel fate.

One can tell simply by looking at you, that not only are you keenly intelligent, but also an extremely compassionate individual. Such a shining paragon of virtue would never send me to such a cruel fate.
Princess, I'm here to escort you to your wedding. My interest in you ends there.
Princess, I'm here to escort you to your wedding. My interest in you ends there.
Princess, I'm here to escort you to your wedding. Your flattery does not interest me.
Princess, I'm here to escort you to your wedding. Your flattery does not interest me.
Fine. Then let me make a proposal that might interest you more. Forget this horrible wedding and take me back to Agaria with you. If you do, I will give you 1000 gold.
Fine. Then let me make a proposal that might interest you more. Forget this horrible wedding and take me back to Agaria with you. If you do, I will give you 1000 gold.
Fine. Then let me make a proposal that might interest you more. Forget this horrible wedding and take me back to Agaria with you. If you do, I will give you 1000 gold.
Fine. Then let me make a proposal that might interest you more. Forget this horrible wedding and take me back to Agaria with you. If you do, I will give you 1000 gold.
And he warned me that you'd try this as well. The answer is no.
And he warned me that you'd try this as well. The answer is no.
Your father warned me that you'd try this. The answer is no.
Your father warned me that you'd try this. The answer is no.
Two thousand!
Two thousand!
Two thousand!
Two thousand!
Princess...
Princess...
Princess...
Princess...
Two thousand and this magical ring I am wearing. Look... please, I'm begging you. It's all I have. Please don't force me to marry Utarg. He's a horrible, vile barbarian!
Two thousand and this magical ring I am wearing. Look... please, I'm begging you. It's all I have. Please don't force me to marry Utarg. He's a horrible, vile barbarian!
Two thousand and this magical ring I am wearing. Look... please, I'm begging you. It's all I have. Please don't force me to marry Utarg. He's a horrible, vile barbarian!
Two thousand and this magical ring I am wearing. Look... please, I'm begging you. It's all I have. Please don't force me to marry Utarg. He's a horrible, vile barbarian!
Princess, I couldn't do what you ask even if I wanted to. Your father has a message that I must return to my queen. He won't give it to me until I have delivered you safely to your wedding.
Princess, I couldn't do what you ask even if I wanted to. Your father has a message that I must return to my queen. He won't give it to me until I have delivered you safely to your wedding.
Princess, I couldn't do what you ask even if I wanted to. Your father has a message that I must return to my queen. He won't give it to me until I have delivered you safely to your wedding.
Princess, I couldn't do what you ask even if I wanted to. Your father has a message that I must return to my queen. He won't give it to me until I have delivered you safely to your wedding.
Then take me to Bartonia first and return for the letter. You will be long gone before Utrarg sends word that I never arrived. He's more interested in his horses than he is in me anyway!
Then take me to Bartonia first and return for the letter. You will be long gone before Utrarg sends word that I never arrived. He's more interested in his horses than he is in me anyway!
Then take me to Bartonia first and return for the letter. You will be long gone before Utrarg sends word that I never arrived. He's more interested in his horses than he is in me anyway!
Then take me to Bartonia first and return for the letter. You will be long gone before Utrarg sends word that I never arrived. He's more interested in his horses than he is in me anyway!
Look... I'll think about it. But no promises!
Look... I'll think about it. But no promises!
Look... I'll think about it. But no promises!
Look... I'll think about it. But no promises!
